website_summaries.verdict: Buyers looking for a no-nonsense, high-quality dog dryer will find their match in this reliable machine.
pros: Built with steel for ultimate durability and longevity
Customers appreciate its high quality construction and easy-to-use design
cons: The machine itself can get rather hot when in use

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY FLYING PIG
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY FLYING PIG!!!! This is a GREAT company that will work with you - take their time to explain how to do something including sending a u-tube video! This product can be used as a forced air dryer and with a quick change be converted into a stand dryer for hands-free drying and brushing. With a house full of standard poodles - that is an enormous help - I don't have to deal with two different tools - one will do the job of both! Highly, highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra  Sterns

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is awesome! I really like how you can adjust the temperature and the airflow. It's super quiet too compared to other force dryers. It has pretty strong airflow too! It may not be as strong as a full sized force dryer, but it's strong enough to do a blow out on a husky and get all the loose fur out. It's very strong for it's little size. It's also super light so it's really easy to carry it around the salon. The hose is really durable too and it fits well into the dryer. Great product! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily J Shea

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research before ordering this dryer and found that it provided the best bang for the buck. Unfortunately, the one that I got was a lemon, and I was in a pinch because I had a dog show to attend with my Old English Sheepdog in less than 48 hours. Trying not to panic, I called the number provided on the instruction packet and the person whom I spoke with was generous enough to send me a new dryer with overnight shipping. It arrived the following morning and it works like a charm. HUGE thank you for the outstanding customer service. I will be telling everyone at the show about this great product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Durable and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I am home based groomer, so I have a low daily volume of clients. I do about 5 dogs a day 4 days a week. My favorite things about this product are the high, low, and off settings for the heating element, and the dial for the amount of forced air. It also comes with 2 nozzles. I have been using this unit for almost a year now with no hiccups. Cleaning the filter is also very easy, requiring only unscrewing a cover on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Christine O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Loud and heavy. Doesn’t dry any better than a high quality blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is form home use. I have two 50+ lb doodles and it was taking a long time to dry them when washing between grooming. I expected much more drying power. It’s loud and heavy but doesn’t dry my dogs any faster than a good quality hand held blow dryer. Now I just own a big bulky EXPENSIVE dryer. I would not recommend unless you have tons of storage space and money to waste.
customer_reviews.author: GA shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to groom angora rabbits and I needed a strong blower with no heat. This dryer is very well made and worked fantastic, but I determined that it was not exactly what I needed for the rabbits. This is a great dryer/blower for dogs. After returning this dryer the seller contacted me and we determined which of their products would suit my grooming needs better. I received a slightly different dryer in just two days, and it is exactly what I needed. The representative was very friendly and helpful, best customer experience in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Meh, have duck tape handy, good airflow.
customer_reviews.text: Have a Great Pyrenees, lots of coat, I like no heat option, biggest complaint is the hose and connectors. The glue turned loose and keeping the hose connected to the unit is a pain as well as the connectors on the end. Duck tape is my friend. Really annoying to struggle with the hose so much. I might think twice about buying. Be willing to doctor the hose.
customer_reviews.author: AlekonaS

customer_reviews.title: Flying Pig Best Dog Grooming Dyer!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Flying Pig dog dryer!! First the I have to say I needed help with my dryer after owning it for 12 months and I called and spoke with someone who was top notch in terms of friendly helpful solutions and to my surprise they surpassed my expectations and solved the problem to my complete satisfaction! My Berners love sitting for the Flying Pig because they love the heat and gets them dry much faster than any other dryer I've owned!!! I'm not a professional groomer but lover of dogs and can honestly say I will continue to recommend and purchase again from this company! Thanks Flying Pig! :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Froze

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This product was a disappoint. I could not get the nozzles to stay on. Every time I turned it on, one end or the other would pop off. Then on the off chance the nozzle stayed on, the hose got so hot that I could barely hold it with my bare hand. Super hot on the hose with cool air coming out of the nozzle just does not seem right. Very noisy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Good...but did not last
customer_reviews.text: I loved this dryer...unfortunately it burned up after a few weeks. Literally the wires inside burned. I am a professional groomer and when this worked it was great dryer but it did not work for long unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Dore S

customer_reviews.title: Mac Daddy Dryer! Saves So Much Time!
customer_reviews.text: This thing could blow the fur off my poodles! I don't use it at full capacity and it still cut down my drying time in half! Love this dryer. Portable and heavy duty. Note, I do use ear plugs on my dogs (or pet hoodie) with this unit, as it has a slight high pitched noise and tremendous air flow. The dogs got used to it pretty quickly. Would highly recommend to any groomer!
customer_reviews.author: Creative Doodler

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE!!!  JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pet dryer, and when I first connected the hose to the dryer, the hose does not stay on. In order for this to work affectively, you need to tape the hose to the dryer. This is terribly designed, and needs to go back to the drawing-board. If you purchase this pet-dryer, be prepared to be very disappointed/upset!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer with Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Dryer stop working after 9 months, but customer service immediately responded to correct the problem. They provided free shipping to look at the dryer and found what appeared to be a loose wire in the motor. The dryer was returned and is now working well. It is a very good dryer and I highly recommend it. The company's quick response to correct the problem is what all consumers wish for when a problem arises from a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blower terrible hose amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: The blower itself is great the hose however is not - we’ve had it a few months and had small tears in the hose - and cannot find replacement - I just saw it’s still under warranty so will look at replacing hose- update I contacted Flying Pig about hose and they responded quickly and immediately with a replacement hose after receiving digital copy of my receipt! Changing my review to a 4 because of how quickly they responded and made it right! Hopefully this won’t happen again
customer_reviews.author: R Rynlds

customer_reviews.title: High quality item !
customer_reviews.text: Quiet yet poweful machine. Why pay $500 or more when this works great!? I have a Newfoundland and she requires a dryer so she doesn't get "hot spots" and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: RMR Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase for the casual groomer or professional groomer.
customer_reviews.text: Being a professional groomer with my own business, I've used lots of different force dryers. That said, this unit is excellent. Small, powerful, yet surprisingly quiet and affordable. It's variable speed settings, heat settings and attachments make it the perfect fit for ALL coat types and dog temperaments. Best of all, it's fast and time is money!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ashmore

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly quiet and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Used this dry my two year old great pyrenees after her bath for first time and she was dry in less than thirty minutes. She wasn't afraid of it and actually seemed to enjoy it! So happy I finally broke down and purchased it. The cost isn't much if you consider two visits to the groomer would cost more than it's purchase price so it's well worth it! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Prepper

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help blow out the dense undercoat of my GP/Anatolian mix, she wasn’t fond of it first time but we managed and she relaxed eventually. I am sure with consistent use she will have less issues. It really made quick work. We tag teamed her with the zoom groom brush and were done much faster and had so much fur on our driveway, but it’s not in our house.... which was the intent. Out of box easy set up, came with one extra filter. Plug in, adjust heat, and turn on, then adjust airflow. It couldn’t have been easier. Will update later if any issues come up.
customer_reviews.author: RNMere

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard poodle with a long coat, and a good force dryer is a must. My cheap one broke so I decided to invest in this brand. I am very pleased. You can change the speed, not just high or low, but on a dial so you get the perfect speed. You can also have no heat, or high and low heat. I’m able to blow out my poodle’s coat straight and fluffy. Saves me a ton of time on drying. I’ve also used it to blow out the loose undercoat of my Aussie. It sent clumps of hair flying everywhere, and she felt so much better afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Good Products
customer_reviews.text: Own multiple items from Flying Pig in my salon. This dryer packs a punch & definitely gives you bang for your buck. Having control of adjusting the force of the air is extremely handy versus some that only have two air pressure options. Use on everything from our toy sized dogs to pyrenees.
customer_reviews.author: David Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional dog groomer and this dryer definitely does a pretty good job for the price. I was looking at much more expensive driers but didn’t want to spend the money for just a back up drier. For a time frame to keep in mind, I can dry my fiancé’s husky with this drier in about 45-hour. I just don’t care for the heat setting. Also, the tube is pretty dangerous when it slips out of your hands 😂
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest from a Groomers standpoint
customer_reviews.text: We have groomed and blown out over 100 dogs with this blower at our salon. We eneded up getting another one. The black rings on this blower that holds the attachment heads on and the hose on ALWAYS fly right off. Which in return freaks the dogs out. We have found a WAY more efficient blower that stays intact while blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Joy

customer_reviews.title: Love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: Update I am a little worried because not even 2 months old and I only work part-time this dryer has a burning smell now when I turn it on sigh I absolutely love this dryer definitely Cuts drying time a lot I would say wouldn't have a lot of kickback to make sure it is somewhere secure when using it so it doesn't fall.
customer_reviews.author: Kelz TLC Grooming

customer_reviews.title: Revised: it does have enough drying power
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and only used it once on my Sheepdoodle. I bought it thinking it would dry as quickly as the one at the groomers. Not even close. I think the hairdryer dries her faster. I’ll try it again, but if no better will return as it’s too much money when my hairdryer does just as well. REVISED: I used this again and realized using the attachments to focus the air flow, really makes a difference. The power is greater and faster. I will be keeping and using this. The only downsides are price and it is loud (scares our doodle) but I think she'll get used to the noise.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Skip this purchase for something more stable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had two hoses just “fall off” during the middle of the grooming! Unbelievable. The customer service is very responsive- A+ for great service. They have asked me to update the review and my response will stay as stands. 2 out of 5 stars. Unfortunately this dryer has proven to be unreliable in its function and I am unwavering.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Skarr

customer_reviews.title: poor air output and difficult handling
customer_reviews.text: This dryer puts out some what warm air, but very difficult to hold the tube in my hand for blow dry. The air can be strong, but then I had difficult time to hold onto the tube. Incredibly loud noise that scared my dogs. I would not recommend this dryer. waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: This thing Blows.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used it every weekend since I bought it. Used it To groom my two huskies, blow the grass off the backyard, and dust off random hardware around the house. The power is amazing and noise reduction is impressive! This is my second dryer bought off Amazon and the more expensive one. Worth every penny so far, more power than the 60-70 dollar range blowers and time will tell if it will last against the husky test. I'll update in about a year with results and maybe another star.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good for home use. A little expensive but you get what you pay for. From the reviews, see that this dryer is used by professionals, wanted one that will stand up to long term use at home for our little dog. Bought a cheaper unit that burned out and wasn't able to buy motor brushes or figure out how to DIY repair it. This dryer has available motor brushes etc. like a pro unit should. Based on the instructions I shouldn't have to replace brushes for many hundreds of hours (i.e. years) of use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lau

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it very long but am very pleased so far. I have 4 med-large long haired dogs including a rough collie. I also groom my sister and friends dogs so this dryer will get use. I have bated all my dogs twice now and have used the dryer. I can't turn it all the way up yet because it has so much force my dogs get nervous, but hopefully after time the will get used to it. I love that you can turn the heat on high or low and even off. So far I would definitely recommend this dryer to anyone that asks me about it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty McCord

customer_reviews.title: Best dryer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I can not say enough good things about this dryer!! It’s powerful enough to blow out a husky’s undercoat but quiet enough to not freak out the pups. It’s lightweight and easy to use. I love that you can turn the heat on or off and that it has an adjustable speed. I dry at least 8 dogs a day, this thing is a work horse!! And you can’t beat the price! I switched from a K9II to the flying pig and I’ll never go back!
customer_reviews.author: Groomer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the 4 hp purple model. First off it's not anywhere close to 4hp 2nd for $50 more I could have gotten an amazing dryer that is 4hp . I have had the basic blue flying pig dryers and those are great. This purple turd is not good at all stay away
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Used in grooming salon
customer_reviews.text: I'm a groomer and had to replace my metro dryer at work when it stopped turning on. This one works great and I love being able to lock the attachments in place, control the force of the air, and turn the heat on and off. It takes slightly longer than the more expensive dryers but I think its well worth the $173 I paid. I will likely order another.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself in one use
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any snow breed. He hates baths and takes nearly 24 hours to dry. He isn't having brushing either... this cuts his drying time down, no need for brushing and he literally falls asleep during blow dry time. It's almost like a massage for Kenai. This is also great for taking him on the deck to do a quick blow out and release loose fur. This blower saves hours of torment for all involved.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Double Coat Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This little dryer packs a big punch, helped my dry my 120lb Alaskan Malamute and blow out tons of loose fur. I has a knob that lets you have fine control over the speed of the dryer which I really appreciated. it does have a heater setting but i don't think that is needed unless in a really cold climate. I have used it once so far and will update my review after a few more uses. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sparklecatomatic

customer_reviews.title: Goldendoodle Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer for my curly Goldendoodle. I LOVE. The hose broke off so I emailed Flying Pig customer service and they sent me a new hose with a tracking number right away. Amazing customer service and wonderful product! Should have bought it sooner. It's a lifesaver and worth the investment. Very satisfied customer. Thank you for the quick response and excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dog groomer and this dryer is awesome! It did have a smell to it at first, but I just let it air out until I need to use it. Nice and light, compact, and the hose expands when you use it. My boss tried it and is getting one for her house calls. A past review said they replaced their broken k9 dryers with this. While I enjoy this dryer very much, and it is quite powerful, it's definitely not as powerful as a K9. Blowing out a coat on a larger dog would take more time with this - smaller dogs it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little dryer. It's the perfect size for our dog grooming shop. The bathers and groomers love it. And surprisingly enough it's taken a beating and is still going strong after about a year..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! Blows with so much force you can use it to clean your ceiling fans (which I did by accident!). Quiet. The heat setting does not get too hot for comfort. Compact. And mult-purpose! We use it to blow dirt off the deck and out of vents, too! The price is so competitive and the dryer is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: JLChicago

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FELLOW GROOMERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Broken, lasted one round of drying. Glue came apart, I’d like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm on my huskies!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It arrived very quickly. We have several siberian huskies who are blowing their coats and this works like a charm! Granted, it’s winter time so we did it indoors and it made my living room look like an actual snow globe haha! My dogs are happier, I’m happier. It’s a win win. Very high powered, and not too loud that it freaked my dogs out. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Blew hard, but wish it was warmer.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but I wish it had heat with it. My little miniature schnauzer froze, she was shaking (I usually use my hairdryer). I used it on my bernedoodle (90 lbs.) and it took like 1 hour to do half his body. I think having heat would have sped up the process. Returned it with absolutely no problems from the manufacturer! The were great about it!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: The hose gets really hot
customer_reviews.text: I would say dryer is ok. Good for dogs that are afraid of the dryer because it has a really low setting. The biggest problem aand it's a big one is that the hose gets really hot really fast.
customer_reviews.author: roro

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer for Your Car...and Your Pet!
customer_reviews.text: Why spend 250 -450 dollars for a car blow dryer?? This one does the trick quickly and effectively. Wish I’d bought this sooner. My dog dries within minutes as well....
customer_reviews.author: L&E

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: OK, maybe my Tempurpedic mattress and Jura coffeemaker are right up there, but with 3 German Shedders, 1 Golden Retriever, and 1 Chihuahua, there's a lot of hair ( A LOT) in my place. The Flying Pig helped to blow off a massive amount of hair, a task I did outside so the bird's can use it for making nests. But, the hours I spent Furminating my dogs is now a breeze. This model has a lot of power and the connections keep the hose and accessory in place. For any GSD (or fluffy dog owner) I would say this is the product you've been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brutus

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for the heat
customer_reviews.text: A great little dryer for personal use! However, the hose quickly reaches the temperature of the surface of the sun if you run it for a while, so holding onto it becomes a chore. It does dry my mother's large GSD in a reasonable amount of time, though.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Our groomer recommended a more costly unit, and by comparison this one was a bargain. I've only used it once, but I had my Std. Poodle dry in about 10-15 min. Drying in ambient air takes up to 3-4 hours. The variable volume and adjustable heat (all the way to no heat at all) are terrific. If I must criticize, the nozzle falls off when the collar is misaligned and the pig sticker is peeling off. I've not had it long enough to comment on reliability, but if it continues to operate as it has, I am most pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grooming Business
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is awesome. Cuts my time in half for dog grooming. I have been in the business for 13 years and this is my go to dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a professional grade blower ( I used to groom dogs), but didn't want to spend $400. Tried this little blower and am very pleasantly surprised! Has a heat setting if wanted, and variable speed blow. The high blow is very high! Dried my Lab and Shepherd as quick as the professional blower ! The different size tips are the secret also! Very well worth the money! (and was a plus to be able to get it in purple :) ).
customer_reviews.author: Ann Peters

customer_reviews.title: dries border collies and samoyeds with ease
customer_reviews.text: I needed to help blow some coat out of my border collie and a friend's samoyed. this absolutely did the trick! it cuts down on drying time immensely, reduces the amount of shedding for a while, and makes the dogs much softer and fluffier afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: it's so quiet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after my previous dryer had lost it's desire to continue. I was nervous to order this as its a different brand than what I normally order, but I am SO happy I did!! This thing is so quiet compared to my old metro air - which worked great but it sounded like a tornado was blowing through the groom shop! But this one is music to my ears, not to mention the amazing heat settings. I cannot believe how amazing this dryer is, especially for the price! I wholeheartedly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sondara

customer_reviews.title: Great high velocity pet dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high velocity pet dryer with warm/cold air settings and adjustable air flow. Works really well and my dogs didn’t mind it. I also bought the stand which is worth every penny and makes dog bath day so much easier to do at home
customer_reviews.author: Mabond

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS dryer - my long haired sheltie dries so quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is perfect. I have a very shy sheltie who is afraid of any loud noise. This dryer does not bother her. I love the control over airflow and temperature. I know I am not burning her skin or hurting her in any way. This makes drying her fur so much faster and she looks much fluffier. She looks gorgeous after I have bathed and dried her. Now I can groom her like a pro! I'm so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Francie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Our pups are so fluffy after using this dryer and the drying time is so much less than with the people hair dryer we were trying to use before. Our dryer wasn't staying at full strength and I messaged customer service and they were very easy to work with. They sent a new dryer and it's working great. I would definitely buy their products again.
customer_reviews.author: waitingforryder

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a groomer. I use it for Bailey's baths. His fur looks 100% better, a lot fluffier like he had come from a groomer. The surprise - with all the rain we've had, he loves to get his feet and "tummy" dried after our walks. Of course bribes (treats) help.
customer_reviews.author: W. Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Dry  Dog
customer_reviews.text: Pacific Northwest weather is wet and this keeps the dog dry and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Gets the dog dry
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this dryer yet and my opinions are based on 6 different Bouvier des Flanders clubs, especially the grooming club, on their recommendations for buying this product. I will be using it this week so I'll let you know. My bouv is filthy!!
customer_reviews.author: James R. Van der Veen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dogs. Large or small.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for my Australian Shepherd. Not enough power for show cattle though. But it isnt marketed as such so 4 stars from me. It allows you to change the air speed enough that it should work for any size dog or coat length. 2 heat settings for a quicker dry if you need it. So you can blow air without heat,low heat, or more heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The power is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the variable speed, and temperature control. My hose and attachments are constantly coming off and I had to duct tape them on, because I don't have time to chase my attachments across the shop and it scares my did when this happens
customer_reviews.author: Stacy E (Shea) Art

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: We use this twice a week. so 10 or so times. Wife likes how it works. She uses it on some very big dogs. Cuts drying time quite a bit. Quieter than her old one. Slight problem, a switch quit working. 5-7-19 Company was quick to get back to me. Easy to work with. I just received a replacement. Will update again on how the new unit holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Thad Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest dryer! The variety of speeds makes it perfect for all areas. To dry the dog's face, just turn the speed down and it works like a charm. I have had several dryers and this is hands down the best one I have had. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lloose

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer
customer_reviews.text: Great for smaller dogs. Wouldn’t recommend for larger double coated dogs. Light weight, but pretty good velocity with attachment nozzles. The outer collar at the end of the hose is a little big for my hands, but I’m on the small side. Love the variable speeds. It’s the dryer I use the most for small to medium dogs. Great little dryer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: pkoga

customer_reviews.title: Packs the power, for a small dryer.
customer_reviews.text: It's so quiet compared to the old dryer and love the variable speed.
customer_reviews.author: Bosco Kid

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Flying Pig. I had the first one for a couple of years, and it burnt out. We had been very pleased with the performance, so I bought another. The second one burnt out after 10 months, and the company completely covered it. They sent me a new one immediately. Good product, and if you get a lemon, GREAT customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Park

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. My Poodle has not been groomed since the SIP order. I tried with my own blower and it took 90 minutes to dry him. The flying pig took 20 minutes, never got hot, and did a fantastic job.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ruminski

customer_reviews.title: Vendor is Replacing Defective Unit
customer_reviews.text: Update 2: Used the replacement once so far with no issues. Update: Vendor has contacted me reference the defective product. They are shipping a new unit at no cost to me. I will continue to update this as I use the new product. If it lasts past 3 uses I may give it another star. Original blower stopped working after the 3rd use.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs that shed a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning to blow the loose hair off of my dogs, works great! If you have dogs that shed a lot, I highly recommend this product. I have used brushes in the past but the dogs enjoy this blower much better.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: You have to be patient (especially if your dog has a massive double coat like mine - he's a samoyed) but once they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. You have to be patient (especially if your dog has a massive double coat like mine - he's a samoyed) but once they are fully dry after a bath, this thing blows the excess fur right off. Well worth the price as I feel I can get a pet-store quality grooming done by myself within a reasonable amount of time. It has easily paid for itself!

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer to consider for your dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dry my German Shepherd and my Wes highlander terrier. The product is extremely well-made and I love the fact that I can control the heat and the speed of the air. My smaller dog like the gentler airflow and doesn’t have as much hair to dry where as my shepherd has a lot of hair and the blower helps with the deshedding process. Both of my dogs enjoy the grooming and are not afraid of the blower/dryer. I would recommend the product based on quality and function.

I wish the nozzle was a bit longer but overall it is a great product! I noticed a lot of plastic dryers and I am happy I found one that was metal, highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: This dries my Malamute in half the time

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer with variable speed & heat options
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer! I love the variable speed for getting dogs/puppies that are new to dryers used to the feel of the air and the noise. I also like the ability to control the heat, either off, on, Low, or High. The low setting is sufficient for my needs, with grooming golden retrievers, they don't get cold easily, but I do! The versatility of this dryer is pretty nice. Very glad I chose this one. The only thing I don't like is the attachments tend to fall off sometimes, but I believe that is my fault.

Customer service at Flying Pig is pretty good. They usually get back to you in a few days.

If you are looking for a forced air dryer this is the one you should get.
